summary: Like the legendary Sisyphus, deliverymen Laurel and Hardy struggle to push a large crated piano up a seemingly insurmountable flight of stairs.
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Dinah|Billy Gilbert|William Gillespie|Charlie Hall|Hazel Howell|Lilyan Irene|Sam Lufkin
keywords: national film registry|slapstick comedy|1930s|reference to sisyphus|piano
title: Haciendo de las suyas
